title: The bane chronicles
description:
The Bane Chronicles series


LINK : http://www.goodreads.com/series/92965-the-bane-chronicles#


11 works, 1 primary work

A Collection of Ten Short Stories centred around Magnus Bane.

This batch contained complete titles to date of upload.

Started in March, one short story in the cycle will be released every month in e-book format. This will be followed by a single print edition in 2014.
